app.name: DWIMM
app.description: DWIMM is a simple and self-hosted budgeting software.
notFound.headline: Page not found
notFound.message: Sorry, but the page you were looking for wasn't found.

budgetedLastMonth.title: Budget from last month
budgetedLastMonth.description: Takes over the amount you already budgeted for {{month}}.

budgetedAverage.title: Budgeted on average
budgetedAverage.description: Budgets the amount you have budgeted on average.

spentAverage.title: Average Spent
spentAverage.description: Budgets the amount spent last year on average.

default.headline: An error has occurred...
default.message: Unfortunately an unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

login.title: Sign in
login.pawned:
Das eingegebene Passwort scheint nicht sicher zu sein, wir haben es in diversen Daten-Leaks gefunden.
Bitte verwende ein sicheres Passwort oder verwende einen Passwort-Manager.

new.prompt: What name should the document have?

general.headline: General Settings
general.description: Change name of document and currency used, delete document

accounts.headline: Accounts
accounts.description: Add and remove bank accounts, credit cards and other assets

plugins.headline: Plugins
plugins.description: List of plugins activated in this document

admin.headline: Permissions
admin.description: Manages permissions for this document so others can work with you on it

user.headline: Access
user.description: See your permissions for this document or leave the document

delete.title: Delete document
delete.message: If you delete this document, all plugins in it will be removed and all data related to the document (e.g. transactions and budgets) will be deleted.
delete.confirm:
If you delete this document, all plugins in it will be removed and all data related to the document (e.g. transactions and budgets) will be deleted.

Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action cannot be undone!

delete.title: Delete category

move.message: You can only delete this category when there are no more budgets in it. However, you can move all contained budgets to another category and then delete the category.

delete.message: This category no longer contains budgets, so it can be easily deleted.

documentSettingsAccount.headline: Account Settings
documentSettingsAccount.empty: No accounts are currently defined in this document.

import.headline: Drop file
import.message: Pull your export files from your online banking here to import them into DWIMM

transactionDetails.reconciling: This transaction was inserted automatically, since the account balance in DWIMM and the account balance in the bank's history was different. Now everything should fit again. Do you often find such transactions, this could be an indication that something is wrong with the synchronization.

transactionImport.headline: Import transactions
transactionImport.multipleFiles: You can currently only import one file at a time. Sorry...

delete.title: Konto löschen
delete.message: Du kannst dieses Konto löschen, da es keine Transaktionen enthält.

documentSettingsPlugin.headline: Plugins
documentSettingsPlugin.empty: Currently there are no plugins installed.

uninstall.title: Uninstall plugin
uninstall.message: You can uninstall this plugin at any time. Data created by this plugin will be retained.

error.getMetadata: Unable to get a transaction's metadata:

documentSettingsPermissions.headline: Permissions
documentSettingsPermissions.infoText: You have full access to the document "{{document}}". If you want to invite other people to this document, please contact your administrator.

leave.headline: Leave document
leave.message: If you don't want to have access to this document anymore you can leave it here. If you want to access the document again, you have to be invited again first.
